document_data.mainbody:
runehunt was a religious ceremony observed by the Uthgardt barbarians of the Savage Frontier.
A runehunt was held during the Uthgardt Runemeet in the month of Eleint. At this time the future warriors of a tribe would seek victory over their tribes enemy, which usually involved orcs. Upon successfully returning from a runehunt, the candidates would then participate in the telhut.
